TopicTitle: Why does the camera have a seizure whenever I crash

Articles.Content: Whenever I completely destroy my current vessel the camera shakes wildly. It stops when I zoom out and view the area from above. I've been able to reproduce this with mods as well as a fresh 1.2.2 install. Can I have some help? TiA

@Fireheart318

I've seen this before and from what I can tell it has to do with the camera following the root part or the pod with kerbals in it. If that part gets thrown/spun violently after a crash, the camera experiences similar effects while trying to track/follow it.

I could be completely wrong but having had this problem myself, it's just my best guess.
